title: Encounter List and Detail UI
description:
Implement Encounter Management Interface with List and Detail Views

Create a comprehensive encounter management system that displays a filterable list of encounters and detailed information for individual encounters.

Requirements:

List View:
- Display encounters in a table/list format with key information (date, patient, provider, type, status)
- Implement filtering functionality by:
  - Date range (from/to dates)
  - Provider name
  - Encounter type
  - Encounter status
- Add sorting capabilities (by date, provider, type)
- Include pagination or infinite scroll for handling large datasets
- Show loading states while fetching data
- Handle empty states when no encounters match filters

Detail View:
- Display comprehensive encounter information:
  - Encounter metadata (ID, date/time, location, type, status)
  - Associated patient information
  - Assigned provider details (name, role, credentials)
  - Related documents (list with names, types, dates)
- Make documents accessible (viewable/downloadable)
- Provide navigation back to list view
- Handle cases where encounter data is incomplete

Technical Considerations:
- Determine data source (API endpoint, database query)
- Define encounter data model and required fields
- Implement responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Add error handling for failed data fetches
- Consider access control/permissions for viewing encounters
- Ensure HIPAA compliance if dealing with protected health information
